Well, C++ certainly has the capability; whether or not the code structure of 
gladiator makes it feasable to do is another issue.  I haven't looked at the 
code [yet], and don't actually know much about coding network games (though I 
plan to learn by april), but Sean or Zardus may be able to cast some light on 
the multiplayer prospects of Openglad specifically.
Bjorn

On Thursday 09 January 2003 07:47, you wrote:
> and boom, this game could almost go market :) �well anyway, like I said,
